Comments_List: Basic leadership theory and practical guidance from active duty officers.
The reading did not always seem completely necessary. However, I thought the public speaking activity, the seminar and the presentation were good training.
Only if you need it for the Navy. For the most part, it is just lectures based on the reading from a very general (and fairly dry) textbook.
